name: 8Bit Legend white
description:
Product description

Did you know that 87% of the human population will be more attracted to you, if you wear this t-shirt?
Yeah, exactly. I made this up. Whatever. This tee is awesome! Wear Pinziboy, the 8-Bit Legend printed on comfy white t-shirts and show off like the cool kid you are.

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

name: TMN-Tee
description:
Product description

Childhood memories! One of the best shows when we were young. I know you loved the turtles, too. Here's your chance to show your affection. Cowabunga, amigo!

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

description:
Product description

What an amazing t-shirt! So good, you'll consider wearing it at your wedding. Suits are so overrated, anyway..
Colourful, sexy & magic. Every tee should be like this.

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

name: Lump Family Case
description:
Product description

The Lump Family design is a remake of an older illustration which has won the first prize in a sneaker design contest back in 2008. You can buy the sneaker here.

Taste and skills change and so it was about time to create a fresh new version of this old idea. More details, more variety, more fun.

Currently only available for the Apple iPhone 5.

  • High Quality wooden Snap-On-Case
  • Easily accessible controls
  • Protects your iPhone from dust, scratches and friction
  • Free shipping within Germany

1 free screen protector "Crystal" & 1 free micro fiber cloth included

Production and shipping are handled by our partners at Quadocta.com.

More images

Tags

accessories, handy, smartphone, iphone, iphone 5, case, wood, bamboo, characters, laser, engraved, brown, loud, fast, radical, rad, LFR

name: Laser Kidz Black
description:
Product description

Become part of the crew. Become a Laser kid. On last years summer season we released the Laser Kidz design exclusively on white and heather grey tees. Now to celebrate the online shop relaunch, we added this new classic black colorway to the family. It's brandnew. Be one of the first to rock it.

Available for ladies and gents. Even available for your grandmother. Make her a laser kid, too.

Tags

name: loud fast rad multi
description:
Product description

Large print of that sexy custom Loud Fast Rad handstyle design. 20% of the sales of this product will go into the "Save The Dinosaurs" fund.

We are loud! We are fast! We are Rad! Nuff said.

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

name: LFR Lab brown
description:
Product description

Welcome to the laboratory of sensory overload!
That's the message on this fresh brown tee. The design has already been released some time ago, but unfortunately we have never been able to print it. However, due to high demand, we decided to release it now and give you the opportunity to look so damn rad.

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

name: The Shoe
description:
Product description

Attention! This is a one of a kind high quality LFR Sneaker. Produced in cooperation with Ryz Wear back in 2008. It is so rare, you won't believe it even exists. This sneaker features a lot of high end activities, such as walking, running, dancing, sleeping. You can even wear these shoes for dinner. And did I mention there is only 1 single exclusive pair available in the whole world?

Only available in size US 9/ EU 42

Tags

name: The Power
description:
Product description

Strong, sexy, unique. Wear this most awesome t-shirt and you will become none of this. Or maybe you will? Who knows. Truth is, this tee is extra hot and you will regret not buying it, once it's sold out and gone forever. You had your chance...

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

description:
Product description

Elbow Drops are awesome! One of the most classy wrestling moves ever. So real and so beautiful. Wear this tee, climb up the top rope and destroy your enemies with style.

Available in unisex for ladies & gents.

Product description

name: LFR Lab Poster
description:
Product description

"Willkommen im Labor für Reizüberflutung" This sexy typographic poster is so rad, you should buy a whole lot and use them as wallpapers for your appartment. The above text means "welcome to the laboratory of sensory overload". You digg? Specs: DIN A1 (594 x 841 mm) Poster. Printed on unbreakable 210 g/m² high quality waterproof latex paper. Very limited in numbers!
